reviews.review: Herkesin deneyimlemesi gereken bir oyun hikayesi falan her şeyi mükemmel herkes genelde bulmaca oyunu diye geçiştiriyor ama inanın bana çok daha fazlası 1.oyun evet daha çok bulmaca odaklı hikaye çok öğrenmiyorsun ama 2.oyun off mükemmeldi şuanda bittiği için çok üzülüyorum güzel bir maceraydı birde iki kişilik multiplayer oynanan bir hikayesi daha var onu daha oynayamadım :(
Awesome game, lots of story, lots of action and definitely lots of fun. Need to play the first game before, though.

хорошая душевная игра , красивый саундтрек и приятна графика . Если честно это первая  игра которая не была шутером ,но она мне понравилась .

I originally played Portal 2 on Xbox 360 before ascending to the PCMR, but I just completed it for the fourth time and it's still as phenomenal as the day I first completed it in 2012. The puzzles are brilliant, the storyline and dialogue are so well done and the characters are equally as perfect. 10/10 game, I'd recommend it to anyone.
单人剧情和双人剧情都通关了，总体上来讲，还是不错的一款解谜游戏，很棒

Portal serisine bir süredir başlamayı düşünüyordum. Yeni yılda satın alma fırsatı edindim. Portal 2 cidden sıkmayan bulmacaları ve ilginç bir hikayesiyle sizi büyülüyor. FPS oyunların sadece ateş etden ibaret olmadığını güzel hatırlatan oyunlardan. Oynanılması gereken en güzel 100 oyundan biri Portal 2 benim için.

this is a puzzle solving game not mirrors edge.
Heaps to do in this game, has a co-op and a single player story that is VERY NICE. And if you ever want more, you got the community levels, which are really nice as well.
One of the best games ever.  The portal gun is such a fun mechanic.  Just finished the co-op and had a blast with that too.  10/10
Even thought this the second time I've played portal 2 story completely I still love it as a classic and the fact that I played it so much I still can't help remember as a classic.

Отличная головоломка, забавные персонажи, изобретательные головоломки, шикарное музыкальное сопровождение и озвучка персонажей (в особенности сигналы роботов).

this is my all time favourite game

El juego es buenisimo, el singleplayer tiene una historia, que aunque no es compleja, es graciosa y tiene un buen ritmo
El multiplayer es divertido de jugar con amigos, pero no recomiendo con randoms
Los niveles de la comunidad hay 2 tipos: Obras maestras mejor que el original o basura olorosa

Recomiendo jugar 100%
Holy crap I love this game. The story, EPIC. The game play, EPIC.

Whereas this game's fanbase is a cancer, this is still an excellent ghame. Try not to listen to the people calling it overrated garbage. The small but vocal amount of people calling the the game overrated were told by others that it was the best game ever made, and when it did not meet those expectations, they justifiably thought it was overrated. This may be the best game ever to many, but not all. No matter what however, calling the game simply 'bad' instead of 'not perfect' or 'not my thing' would be an outright lie. Gameplay is tight and very creative, playing into the plot perfectly. I will not reveal any spoilers about this game since it is best to go in completely blind. If you are even somewhat interested in the genre or intrigued by the screenshots, buy this game. You will not regret it.
I mean, who hasn't played the Portal games yet?
great puzzle game and great story

e dai fica caindo infinitamente

This game is absolutely amazing in so many ways, and will forever be one of my all-time favorites.
It has incredible writing with a sharp sense of humor.
GLaDOS is an exceptional villain and Wheatley is amazingly fun, and both are brought to life through superb voice acting.
The puzzles are well thought out and always fresh, as new mechanics keep showing up throughout gameplay.
A timeless classic that most everybody who appreciates games should play at some point. Easiest 10/10 I've ever given.
Forever a classis, even after years of being first released
Yea, this is the greatest single player game ever created. When it comes to the story, the puzzles, the music, and everything in between, nothing even compares.

Si malditas plabras, este juego es un cagado de risa y diversion, los puzzles son intersantes y necestias beuna IQ para superarlos. El coop es FABULOSO, es un cago de risa y simplemente boludear con un amigo es divertido. Gasta to Fucking dinero ahora
A bit to easy but nice game.
Theres a reason its a classic
esta buenardo tanto en historia como multijugador

Al igual que el juego anterior, éste es todavía mejor, no solo porque es más larga la historia sino que se incluyen más personajes y una calidad de gráficos bastantes mejorados comparados a la anterior entrega, tampoco pierde la escencia de la primera parte, recomendado
This game is great, kinda lazy don't feel like talking to long but its great.
genial, muy divertido para jugar con amigos.
Really good game, a bit laggy at times but apart from that, incredible gameplay, great story, heaps of really cool player made levels, i really recommend it
It's a Valve game. The second best one in fact. Buy it.

Portal 2 это когда: ОХ КАКОЙ МИЛЫЙ КУБИК! Куда? В печь? А, ну да, куда же ещё.
Portal 2 это когда: Роботизированный голос лучше чем большинство живых протагонистов в других играх.
Portal 2 это когда: Прямо из портала можно создать тот же портал в другом месте и почувствовать себя доктором стренджем.
Portal 2 это когда: История о ПРЕДАТЕЛЬСТВЕ трогает до глубины души.
Portal 2 это когда: Ты не хочешь уничтожать ТУРЕЛИ, потому что они МИЛЫЕ.
Portal 2 это когда: Куб КОМПАНЬЙОН пробыл с тобой меньше минуты.
Portal 2 это когда: ДА БЛ..ЯДСКИЙ ТЫ ПОРТАЛ Х.УЛЕ ТЫ НЕ СТАВИШЬСЯ
Portal 2 это когда: В голове не укладывается как хрупкая девушка может передвигаться на, фактически, каблуках 12 часов.
Portal 2 это когда: Е..БУ ЧЕ Я Х.УЕ ТА а не портальная пушка ты, даже на земле нельзя портал поставить
Portal 2 это когда: Грави-пушка из халвы всё-таки круче.
Portal 3 это когда: Ты перестал читать "Portal 2 это когда:" и не заметил цифру 3 в надписи(гейб?)
Portal 2 это когда: Ты не получаешь ни минуты шутера и эпических взрывов но всё равно получаешь райское наслаждение.

Вольво признались, что делают, параллельно с HL: Alyx ещё одну игру по Portal, и НЕ в vr, по понятным всем причинам связанным с тошнотой, а это значит, что вполне возможно, что наши внуки будут играть в следующую часть. Играть в благородство я с вами не буду, просто поставите лайк, и мы в расчёте, лады?
Nice game to spend a few hours on. Stunning graphics and a fabulous soundtrack.
